DOC.brief_title: Immediate Nausea Vomiting After Administration Non-ionic Contrast Media
DOC.detailed_description: There robust evidence guideline fast prior contrast-enhanced CT scan patient . Substantial heterogeneity exist fast prior contrast-enhanced CT worldwide . Through dedicated questionnaire , investigator plan prospectively assess prevalence risk factor nausea vomit exposure non-ionic contrast medium agent adult patient undergo computed tomography examination .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients undergo contrastenhanced CT examination nonionic contrast medium regular working hour Adult patient ( 20 year old old ) Patients informed write consent Patients observation medical staff CT examination 30 minute . Exclusion criterion : Patients without informed write consent Age patient young 20 year old Uncooperative patient Pediatric , pregnant , emergent patient Patients without sufficient observation medical staff CT examination 30 minute .
